pages.text: $(li)The Trident is a weapon used in both melee and ranged combat.$(br)$(li)It can be enchanted with $(l:patchouli:enchanting/vtweaks/imperishable)Imperishable$(/l), $(l:patchouli:enchanting/vanilla/mending)Mending$(/l), $(l:patchouli:enchanting/vanilla/channeling)Channeling$(/l), $(l:patchouli:enchanting/vanilla/riptide)Riptide$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:enchanting/vanilla/loyalty)Loyalty$(/l) enchants.

pages.text: $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/drowned)Drowneds$(/l) rarely drop this item upon death.
